name: Stupid BBTAN
description:
Stupid BBTAN!!!

Swipe your finger down to throw balls and break bricks!

The angle is key point!

This is a simple but addictive game.

How long can you survive on the Stupid BBTAN?

Game Features:

- Easy and fun to play, challenging to break 100 stage.

- Using physical game engine.

- Colorful UI, Fun sound effects, Simple rule.

- Maybe you can challenge your friends with GooglePlay support in the next version.

Enjoy Stupid BBTAN while you commute, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank and so on. Anytime, anywhere you can play Stupid BBTAN!!
